widget.title: SpinBox
widget.p: SpinBox is a textfield width 2 arrow buttons to change (increase, and decrease by 1) its integer value.

parameters.parameter: Invokes the given method when there was change in the text or a new value was spinned.
text, columns, and editable parameters are described at textfield
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component
